title: STAT+: Biotechs, wary of being tied to Big Pharma, form new industry group as hedge against Trump policies
description: As President Trump hails pricing agreements with the pharmaceutical industry, some biotech companies are worried they have been left out in the cold.
content: As President Trump hails pricing agreements with the pharmaceutical industry, some biotech companies are worried they have been left out in the cold.
